t: Introducing Amazon Nova foundation models: Frontier intelligence and industry leading price performance | Amazon Web Services
s: December 3, 2024 - Amazon Nova foundation models deliver frontier intelligence and industry leading price-performance, with support for text and multimodal intelligence, multimodal fine-tuning, and high-quality images and videos.

t: Amazon Nova foundation models – frontier intelligence and industry leading price-performance
s: 1 day ago - Amazon Nova is a new generation of state-of-the-art foundation models (FMs) that deliver frontier intelligence and industry leading price performance. Build and scale generative AI applications with Amazon Nova foundation models with seamless integration in Amazon Bedrock.

t: What is Amazon Nova? - Amazon Nova
s: Amazon Nova is a new generation of foundation models that deliver frontier intelligence and industry leading price performance, available on Amazon Bedrock. Amazon Nova models include four understanding models, two creative content generation models, and one speech-to-speech model.

t: Amazon makes it easier for developers and tech enthusiasts to explore Amazon Nova, its advanced Gen AI models
s: March 31, 2025 - Amazon Nova includes three models (Nova Micro, Lite, and Pro) that generate text from different modalities and are incredibly fast, capable and cost-effective, and two additional models for generating high-quality images (Nova Canvas) and videos (Nova Reel) from text and image input.

t: Amazon Nova Creative Content Generation Models

t: Amazon Nova for Advertising & Marketing - AWS
s: Amazon Nova, a generation of new foundation models (FMs) from Amazon, empowers agencies, brands, ad/mar-tech, and media companies to create high-impact, on-brand marketing and advertising content at unprecedented speed and scale.

t: What Is Amazon Nova? | Built In
s: December 10, 2024 - Amazon Nova is a suite of foundation models developed by Amazon that includes a text-only model, three multimodal models and two content generation models focused on creating new images and videos.

t: Amazon’s Nova Sonic foundation model understands voice in a whole new way
s: April 8, 2025 - Our new gen AI model picks up on tone, inflection, and pacing, for a deeper understanding of human conversation.

s: 1 month ago - Nova Premier is designed to excel at complex tasks requiring deep context understanding, multistep planning, and coordination across tools and data sources. t: Amazon unveils Nova Act, an AI agent that can control a web browser | TechCrunch
s: March 31, 2025 - Amazon's Nova Act, a new AI model powering components of Alexa+, allows developers to build agentic applications.

t: Amazon launches Nova Premier, its most capable AI model yet | TechCrunch
s: 1 month ago - Amazon has released what it claims is the most capable AI model in the company's growing Nova family, Nova Premier.

t: The Amazon Nova family of models: Technical report and model card - Amazon Science
s: We present Amazon Nova, a new generation of state-of-the-art foundation models that deliver frontier intelligence and industry-leading price performance. Amazon Nova Pro is a highly capable multimodal model with the best combination of accuracy, speed, and cost for a wide range of tasks.

t: Introducing Amazon Nova Act | Amazon AGI Labs
s: March 31, 2025 - Today, we’re excited to introduce Amazon Nova Act, a new AI model trained to perform actions within a web browser. We’re releasing a research preview of the Amazon Nova Act SDK (available via nova.amazon.com), which will allow developers to experiment with an early version of the new model.
